title: How to Craft an Anvil in Minecraft

steps.title: Gather your materials.
steps.content: Gather your materials. You need 31 iron ingots or 3 iron blocks and 4 iron ingots. If you have 3 iron blocks already, skip the next step

steps.title: Create 3 iron blocks.
steps.content: Create 3 iron blocks. These are created by opening a crafting table and placing an iron ingot in every space (9 total).

steps.title: Craft an anvil.
steps.content: Craft an anvil. Put your 3 iron blocks in the top three spaces of a crafting table. Put 1 iron ingot in the center space. Put 3 iron ingots in the bottom three spaces.

steps.title: Drag your new anvil to your inventory.
steps.content: Drag your new anvil to your inventory.
